title: FedEx, Chewy, Darden, and Other Stocks for Investors to Watch This Week
text:
It’s another relatively quiet week on the earnings calendar, with just a handful of major companies releasing their quarterly results. Shipping giant FedEx, software maker Adobe, and online pet store Chewy report on Tuesday. Food company General Mills is next on Wednesday, followed by Olive Garden and LongHorn Steakhouse owner Darden Restaurants on Thursday.

The week’s economic calendar is busier. The Federal Open Market Committee completes its September meeting on Wednesday. The market overwhelmingly expects policymakers...
description: It’s a big week for economic data, with releases on several housing market datapoints and the Fed’s much-anticipated announcement on interest rates coming on Wednesday.
